title: Absorbing Man
description: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it’s in play)

title: Adam Warlock
description: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, draw a card.

title: Aero
description: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played anywhere to this location.

title: Agatha Harkness
description: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

title: Agent 13
description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

title: Agent Coulson
description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-cost and 5-cost card to your hand.

title: Alioth
description: On Reveal: Destroy all unrevealed enemy cards here.

title: Altar of Death
description: When you play a card here, destroy it to get +2 Energy next turn.

title: America Chavez
description: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +2 Power.

title: Angel
description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.

title: Angela
description: After you play a card here, +1 Power.

title: Annihilus
description: On Reveal: Your cards with Power below 0 switch sides. Destroy those that can’t.

title: Ant-Man
description: Ongoing: If your side of this location is full, +4 Power.

title: Apocalypse
description: When you discard this, put it back with +4 Power.

title: Armor
description: Ongoing: Cards here can’t be destroyed.

title: Arnim Zola
description: On Reveal: Destroy one of your other cards here to copy it at the other locations.

title: Asgard
description: After turn 4, whoever is winning here draws 2 cards.

title: Asteroid M
description: After you play a 3 or 4-Cost card, move it here.

title: Atlantis
description: If you only have one card here, it has +5 Power.
